column6: Now entrenched as the Kingpin of Hell's Kitchen, DD faces new dangers from foes who want his new-found power for themselves. Even a Man Without Fear can't defeat an army of 100 men trying to kill him, can he? 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Marvel Knights | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev
